boardgame.name: Mottainai
Mottainai Mini
boardgame.description: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Mottainai_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (pronounced mot/tai/nai or like the English words mote-tie-nigh) means _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Don't waste_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, or _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Every little thing has a soul_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. In the game Mottainai, a successor in the Glory to Rome line, you use your cards for many purposes. Each player is an acolyte in a temple who performs tasks, collects materials, and sells or completes works for visitors. Every card can be each of these three things._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You choose tasks to allow you to perform actions, keeping in mind that other players will get to follow up on your task on their next turn. Clever planning and combining of your works' special abilities is key, as is managing which materials you sell._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Mottainai is a quick, but deep, game experience._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is the Mottainai Mini version for 2-3 players. Played once.

ASMADI GAMES (ASN0120) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Mottainai_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; means _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t waste_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, or _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Every little thing has a soul_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. In the game Mottainai, a successor in the Glory to Rome line, you use your cards for many purposes. Each player is a monk in a temple who performs tasks, collects materials, and sells or completes works for visitors. Every card can be each of these three things. You choose tasks to allow you to perform actions, keeping in mind that other players will get to follow up on your task on their next turn. Clever planning and combining of your works_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; special abilities is key, as is managing which materials you sell. Mottainai is a deep, but quick, game experience.

ASMADI GAMES (ASN0120) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Mottainai_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; means _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t waste_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, or _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Every little thing has a soul_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. In the game Mottainai, a successor in the Glory to Rome line, you use your cards for many purposes. Each player is a monk in a temple who performs tasks, collects materials, and sells or completes works for visitors. Every card can be each of these three things. You choose tasks to allow you to perform actions, keeping in mind that other players will get to follow up on your task on their next turn. Clever planning and combining of your works_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; special abilities is key, as is managing which materials you sell. Mottainai is a deep, but quick, game experience.

ASMADI GAMES (ASN0120) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Mottainai_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; means _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t waste_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, or _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Every little thing has a soul_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. In the game Mottainai, a successor in the Glory to Rome line, you use your cards for many purposes. Each player is a monk in a temple who performs tasks, collects materials, and sells or completes works for visitors. Every card can be each of these three things. You choose tasks to allow you to perform actions, keeping in mind that other players will get to follow up on your task on their next turn. Clever planning and combining of your works_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; special abilities is key, as is managing which materials you sell. Mottainai is a deep, but quick, game experience.
